name: Best Western Premier IB Hotel Friedberger Warte

reviews.text:
Michael, I have spent the last 10 days at your Best Western.  I had a wonderful stay!  I want to point out 2 individuals that were very service oriented and displayed tremendous work ethic. That is Jan and Jill. They worked the restaurant and bar in the evenings. Those two were tremendous!

Darren

The reception staff were very friendly and helpful, rooms were good, but room service was very bad! To them changing the towels is considered job done, zero cleaning of anything in the room or bathroom! Did not even bother to change the coffee cups! Very disappointed
Was very happy with it. Great to stay the night before an appointment at the US consulate which is around the corner.

I had an incredible time at the hotel. The staff welcomed me with smiles and offered me a complimentary drinks voucher because it was my birthday. I liked this personal touch. The facilities were amazing, beds were comfortable and breakfast was really nice. I also enjoyed their great quality gym. It’s better than most 5 star hotels. I enjoyed my stay and I will definitely come back here when I’m back in Frankfurt
Beautiful and modern hotel, with gym and sauna, and a buffet breakfast with a little bit of everything. Little bit far from the city center thought, and the gym is sooooo small.
